item.title: ðŸ™Œ Go blog
item.description: If you would’ve Googled me ten years ago, you probably would’ve ended up on my personal blog. Slowly this personal blog got replaced by all sorts of (social) channels. Facebook. Tumblr. Medium. And website builders like Squarespace. I don’t mind using these channels and services, but I regret neglecting and eventually ditching my blog. I think it’s healthy to keep some sort of archive. And it’s fun right, having this place on the web that’s really yours.
